attributes.action: Free care and support for cancer patients
attributes.additional_details: This is my petition to the Cabinet Office asking for a national task force to create a package financed by the government for the provision of free care and support for cancer patients. Patients particularly on limited income, spend agonising time living with cancer.They can do with all the help and support to make their lives more tolerable.Young patients could face the prospects of their lives being extinguished before they realise what has hit them.As a rich,civilised society we can't just let people die in pain.lets get our priorities right and invest in improving patients quality of life, whats left of it!
